Klasify

Typography

Font styles and modifiers for the typography on the Klaseko platform

Headings

The h1 through h6 tags are available for when you want to match the font styling of a heading but cannot use the associated Klasify element.

<h1>h1 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h1>
<h2>h2 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h2>
<h3>h3 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h3>
<h4>h4 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h4>
<h5>h5 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h5>
<h6>h6 I think I'm getting smaller by the second</h6>

h1 I think I'm getting smaller by the second

h2 I think I'm getting smaller by the second

h3 I think I'm getting smaller by the second

h4 I think I'm getting smaller by the second

h5 I think I'm getting smaller by the second
h6 I think I'm getting smaller by the second

Font helpers and classes

Classes that give you more power over your font and typography

Lead

Make a paragraph stand out by adding .lead class

<p class="lead">Please fill up the necessary fields.</p>

Please fill up the necessary fields.

Text Alignment

Let's you align your text the way you want

<p class="text-left">Sadron's Protracted Frisson!</p>
<p class="text-center">Myrault's Hinder-Gast!</p>
<p class="text-right">Killing Wall of Koryx!</p>

Sadron's Protracted Frisson!

Myrault's Hinder-Gast!

Killing Wall of Koryx!

Text Transform

Transform text in components with text capitalization classes.

<p class="text-lowercase">Shimare's Extractive Pulse!</p>
<p class="text-uppercase">claws of tornarus!</p>
<p class="text-capitalize">zeal of wexort!</p>

Shimare's Extractive Pulse!

claws of tornarus!

zeal of wexort!

Font weight

Quickly change the weight (boldness) text.

<p class="font-thin">Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!</p>
<p class="font-light">Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!</p>
<p class="font-medium">Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!</p>
<p class="font-bold">Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!</p>
<p class="text-small">Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!</p>

Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!

Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!

Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!

Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!

Harlek's Incantation of Incineration!
